scripts.server-start: openssl genpkey -out config/jwt/private.pem -aes256 -algorithm rsa -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:4096 -pass pass:passphrase && openssl pkey -in config/jwt/private.pem -out config/jwt/public.pem -passin pass:passphrase -pubout && symfony server:start --port=8001
scripts.dependencies: composer install && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.truncate-database: symfony console d:d:d --if-exists --force && symfony console d:d:c && symfony console d:s:u --force --complete && symfony console d:f:l -n
